def_cn: 学业能力倾向测验(升读大学需要参加的一种考试)
def_en: The SAT is an examination which is often taken by students who wish to enter a college or university. SAT is an abbreviation for (缩略=) 'Scholastic Aptitude Test'.

def_cn: (针对七岁学童的)标准课业测评考试
def_en: SATs are a set of tasks given to seven-year-old schoolchildren in order to test their ability. SAT is an abbreviation for (缩略=) 'Standard Assessment Task'.
Sat is the past tense and past participle of sit.
